sentences.en: Was your daddy heartbroken when they got a divorce?
sentences.cn: 他们离婚时你爸爸很伤心吗？

sentences.en: "I was so heartbroken when I saw him, I cannot describe it." said his elder brother, Xu Linfu, recalling his first visit there, in 2007.
sentences.cn: “当我看到他的时候，我的心都碎了，这种心情无法言说。”他的兄长徐林福回忆起2007年他第一次去那里时说。
